categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During a skirmish on the planet Vatleria during the Galactic Civil War the Alliance to Restore the Republic unit known as the Rebel Four attacked a secret base of the Galactic Empire. Although the Rebel Four defeated the stormtroopers guarding the base, Darth Vader detected them with the Force and sprung a set of traps; the Rebel Four all perished as a result.
